title: Everton v Fulham, West Ham v Burnley, and more: football clockwatch – live
summary: Barry Glendenning will provide live updates on Premier League matches and other events starting at 3pm GMT. Stay tuned for the latest scores and highlights. Don't miss out on the action!

title: WTA Finals tennis: Aryna Sabalenka v Elena Rybakina in the final – live
summary: Taha Hashim will provide updates on the season-ending tournament taking place in Riyadh. The event marks the conclusion of the competitive season. Stay tuned for final results and highlights from the tournament.

title: Scotland v New Zealand: Autumn Nations Series rugby union – live
summary: The All Blacks are set to face off against their opponents at Murrayfield, with Lee Calvert providing live updates on the event. Fans can expect a detailed minute-by-minute report on the match's progression. Tune in for real-time insights and commentary.

title: Sunderland v Arsenal: Premier League – live
summary: Mikel Arteta's league-leading team is set to play at the Stadium of Light. Scott Murray will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans can follow along for live commentary and insights.

title: Driver livestreams herself on TikTok as she apparently hits and kills man in Chicago
summary: A TikTok video features a woman recording herself when a loud thud interrupts her. She reacts with shock and admits, "I just hit somebody." The incident has raised concerns and drawn attention on social media.
